title: 4.3 Master Challenge 2
question:
Create an animation about your favorite things. Each page should have a background, characters, sound and text to explain the following:
1. Your favorite place
2. Your favorite subject
3. Your favorite food
4. Your favorite book

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
